pageProduct.name: Thompson's Liver Cleanse 120 Capsules
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thompson's Liver Cleanse Traditionally used in Western herbal medicine to support liver & digestive system health and
supports natural liver detoxification processes.

Thompson's Liver Cleanse contains a blend of herbs that support the natural liver detoxification processes and aids body waste elimination. In Traditional Western herbal medicine, it is used to/as:
- Support & enhance liver health as a liver tonic and protect the liver
- Promote bile production & flow
- Support digestive system health
- Relieve digestive discomfort, abdominal bloating & flatulence symptoms
- An antioxidant decreasing free radical damage to body cells

Suitable For: Vegetarian/Vegan.

Size: 120 Capsules

KEY FEATURES

• Helps support the liver and gall bladder.
• Helps relieve digestive disturbances including flatulence.
• Helps maintain healthy elmination and detoxification function.
• Vegetarian/Vegan friendly.
• Promotes bile production & flow
• An antioxidant to decrease free radical damage to body cells

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare professional. Do not use if bottle and/or cap seal is missing or broken.

CAUTION

Keep out of reach of children.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Each capsule contains:
Cynara scolymus (Globe Artichoke) ext. 42.86mg
derived from dry leaf 1.5g (1500mg)
Schisandra chinensis (Schisandra) ext. 83.4mg
derived from dry fruit 500mg
Silybum marianum (Milk Thistle) ext. 175mg
derived from dry seed 12.25g (12250mg)
Taraxacum officinale (Dandelion) ext. 12.5mg
derived from dry root 50mg
Taurine 100mg

Allergen Free From: Artificial Colours| Artificial Flavours| Artificial Preservatives| Dairy| Egg| Fish| Gluten| Lactose| Nuts| Sesame Seeds| Soy| Sugar

Directions

Store below 30°C in a dry place.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C

RECYCLABLE INFORMATION

Remove cap and recycle glass.

Recyclable Packaging?: Yes
